Martial arts joke?

::Killfest/EndBringer::

Killfest looks over at DrillBit as the bot enters. "Good. 
Blacknightmare here is also teaming up with us. Are your troops ready 
to expell Megatron from the base?"

With a silent order from Killfest, EndBringer walks out of the room, 
also heading for the bridge.
